website_summaries.verdict: The gold standard in chemical-based warmers, these are good for cold-weather hiking, camping or hunting.
pros: These air-activated warmers keep feet warm for hours
The sticky side attaches to the insoles of shoes or hiking boots, so the warmer stays in place
They work well inside of ski boots, too, and are thin enough to keep from bothering hikers
cons: Warmers are be too small for some users, and they don’t always put out enough heat

website_summaries.verdict: These single-use warmers last up to 9 hours and stick in place inside your footwear. They are one-size-fits-most, though, and won't give larger feet as much coverage.
pros: Provides up to 9 hours of heat
Adhesive on one side so they stay in place
Fits in ski boots, hiking boots, and tennis shoes
cons: One size fits all, so comfort may depend upon the size of your shoe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I just got back from a trip to Alaska in March and these insoles were perfect. They are more comfortable than toe warmers and more effective at warming the whole foot. They are smaller than your foot (unless you have really small feet) and they are pointed on one end and round on the other end, so I turned them where the rounded end was under my toes. When I knew we would be walking in snow for a long period of time, I used these on the bottom of my feet and put a toe warmer on top of my toes. I stayed toasty warm.
customer_reviews.author: Lee F.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTLY HOT
customer_reviews.text: These are so amazing, I'm about to purchase more. I've always been a big fan of the hand warmers, and I use those often. Sometimes they take a long time to warm up, but for these, they heat up almost instantly after you take them out of the packet. They get so, soo hot. I was debating on whether to wearing them on my bare skin and slipping my sock on over it because my feet get so cold, but I tried them on my socks, and they got so hot that I had to take a break from them. Not at all what I was expecting but BETTER.
customer_reviews.author: Simrin

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent results
customer_reviews.text: As always some work and some don’t. The ones that worked saved my feet being in the tree stand and then some never activate and your feet freeze. I don’t know why these are so inconsistent when I do the same thing over and over. Just switched to electric socks because of that so will see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Jo40788

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Most toe-sized foot warmers don't generate much or any noticeable heat to me...and I've tried several brands. These give off a very noticeable heat. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JTP

customer_reviews.title: Of course you can not reuse them and that is fine.. that makes sense BUT once you take ...
customer_reviews.text: these come in very handy with cold weather. Of course you can not reuse them and that is fine..that makes sense BUT once you take your shoes off the components of the warmer bubble up and then they are not good after that. So, don't take your shoes off for very long if you want them to last throughout the day. I kept them on for at least 8 hours and my feet were kept warm and toasty. I plan on buying more!
customer_reviews.author: mely

customer_reviews.title: Wear with socks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my sister at Christmas because she is always complaining of cold feet. She stated that it does keep your feet warm but if you only wear nylon, you will feel like your feet are burning. And do not remove the liner so it will stick to your shoes, once the insole stop a working it’s a bear trying to get it out of your shoe. My sister said she ruined a brand new shoes soles. So be warn, but with socks and the cold weather they do work.
customer_reviews.author: Liny

customer_reviews.title: Some work some don't! I think I know the reason!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one regular package with 5 little packs inside but I’ve noticed that 2 packs were not soft (powder texture) as the others 3, so, it sounds that this 2 packs were already activated by “mistake”, I think their packs had air leakage. BE AWARE there is a great chance that they will not work if their texture is not as the same as the powder one. I paid for 100% but just 60% worked! ***Edited Amazon sent me another one and all of them worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Gargioni

customer_reviews.title: Gets extremely hot
customer_reviews.text: These do what they say they do - they get and stay extremely hot. At one point my feet were TOO hot and i almost had to take my boots off and remove them. There is a sticky backing, but once i put them in my boots with the sticky part down, it was super hard to remove them at the end of the day, especially in deep boots. I think I actually just left one in there coz I couldn't get it out. But if you don't use the sticky part, they might move around and bunch up in your shoes, so its probably better to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.text: The amount of warmth generated by these is negligible. I tried 3 pairs of these, gave up, and trashed the others. Others in our group had the same bad experience. The manufacturer’s hand warmers are excellent. Their shoe warmers are worthless. Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Newport Beach Life

customer_reviews.title: These are very good at keeping your feet warm.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these foot warmers - they were really good at keeping my feet warm, and these warmers cover most of my feet. I couldn't find these in the stores, even though most stores had other Hot Hands warmers, including half-foot/toe warmers - but these are much better. I'd recommend them. Be sure to follow the directions, after opening the package, shake the warmers to mix up the contents and wait 5-15 minutes. They get pretty toasty if you wait a period of time after you remove them from the package before you put them in your shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Skinner

customer_reviews.title: They work. And shake them well then wait 10 minutes and put them in your glove pants pocket ETC
customer_reviews.text: I love these they have them for the hand and they have them for their feet and they also have the smaller toe or the feet they all work good for me I like the full-size Total foot won the best the smaller ones I have four at a time two for my glove into in my Jean pockets and also put I'm medium or large on the back of your neck if you're a hunter it makes a huge difference and put one on your belly button area it makes a huge difference for core heat love them use them every year
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: SHORT
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 6.5 women's shoe, and these didn't cover the length of my foot. If you have big feet, these might not be very effective. I also found them to be only adequately warming through my socks, so if you are planning to wear thick socks, you might want to insert them on a second, thinner inner sock! The other confusing thing was how to adhere them -- the first time, I didn't realize the printed clear layer was just there to cover over the adhesive and it wasn't obvious you had to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Kae Bender - Editor and Writer

customer_reviews.title: did not activate :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought the foot and hand warmers and the hand warmers worked very well. my kids play soccer and in the winter while they play out I know it's painful to kick the ball. my daughter was very happy with her hand warmers and was showing them off to her friends and how warm her hands were. the foot warmers never activated she wore a pair and so did I and neither worked :( very disappointed, I thought it was maybe just the pair I used but she said her toes were frozen. wont buy the foot warmers again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last.....
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Winter bike rides and just used them for the first time. I went out for a quick 20 mile ride, which was less then a hour and a half outside. I have to say that about half way through the ride my feet started to feel the cold. When i got home and took of my shoes the warmers were ice cold. Now I didn't expect them to last the 9 hours that was advertised, but I surely expected them to last more then an hour........ I will have to continue my search to find a product to keep my feet warm during my Winter rides.........
customer_reviews.author: Steven Alperstein

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: Work very well. My son works for a ski resort and I ordered these for him as a stocking stuffer. The temps have been in the negatives at the slopes and these insoles have helped to keep his feet warm, good socks and boots are a must too. He liked them so much I just ordered 3 more packs.
customer_reviews.author: kjsPA

customer_reviews.title: Got me through the Chiefs Superbowl season!
customer_reviews.text: Product was a lifesaver. My feet always get cold but not anymore. Wore these through the 2 years of Chiefs playoff games with sub 20 degree temps. I had no issues with any of them activated and I only opened them a few minutes before putting them in my sole. Lasted all day at times they might have even been a little too warm. For someone who dreads cold weather, these are awesome! The even kept me warmer then all the alcohol....
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy H- Truthful reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: I love the hand warmers of this brand, but I found the foot warmers to be a little lacking in heat output (at least to the amount that really helps). I have Raynaud's Disease and need some sort of external heat source on extremities during cold weather. I wear a woman's size 6.5/7 and the insole fits into my shoes well - they're on the small side, so if you have larger feet be cautious.
customer_reviews.author: cynthiac

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for Farmers in the winter months!
customer_reviews.text: I am so grateful for this product! I ordered as a Christmas gift for a farmer friend who struggles with the possibility of frostbite in the winter months. Today the temperature dropped well below 0. He reached out to thank me for his gift, and said that his feet kept warm ALL DAY!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: He came home from duck hunting and was all excited to tell me how wonderful these were and how warm they kept his feet
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an avid hunter, fisherman and all around Sportsman. I've been buying him the Hothands hand warmer's for year's. Christmas 2014 was my first time trying these for him. He came home from duck hunting and was all excited to tell me how wonderful these were and how warm they kept his feet. He got frost-bite on his toe's year's ago, when on a Moose hunt. We have tried a LOT of product's for warm feet, but NONE came close to this one. My hubby is 75 and we finally found his best-foot-friend!!! He told me not to let him be without them. I won't. Service, delivery and packaging were great too.
customer_reviews.author: Syb747

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Feet For Sure
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I work in a warehouse with no heat, so these are amazing for the winter months. They are easy to put in and easy to take out (granted I have to take the whole shoe insert out to do it). They do make your feet hot. I usually have to take them out for a bit as my feet get a bit too toasty. Then I pop them back in 20ish minute later. They last about 6-8 hours? I haven't worn them past 8 so I am not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Beryl Woods

customer_reviews.title: Works in my rubber hunting boots
customer_reviews.text: Not much oxygen gets into my muck hunting boots, however these worked and kept my feet and toes warm with a single pair of socks. The only downfall is they only lasted about 3 hours, then went to barely warm. I let them heat for about 5 min before applying and putting on boots.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: These were great for a vacation to Colorado in the winter
customer_reviews.text: These were great for a vacation to Colorado in the winter. My only issue was some worked great and really heated up while others I could barely tell they were working. So it was a little hit and miss. The ones that did heat up were phenomenal. Also wish adhesive was just a little stronger.
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!  THESE WORK!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome foot warmers! These things really work. I go for upto 4 hour bicycle rides though out the winter and these keep my feet toasty warm for the entire ride. I’ve seen several reviews complaining that they are smaller than expected. These are sized perfectly - follow the guides. They are plenty warm and are more comfortable if they don’t go from the tip of your toe to the back of your heel.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Zandstra

customer_reviews.title: They’re full Insole length
customer_reviews.text: I bought these full insole foot warmers by mistake - thought they were the half insole size. I did use them, they were extremely hot, so going into a warm place they felt like they were burning. They worked well to keep my feet warm on a long cold walk wearing wellies, but one did bunch up and become very uncomfortable. I would only wear these in the most cold situations.
customer_reviews.author: Seascape

customer_reviews.title: Great To use while shopping in New York at Christmas time
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I found interesting when using these was, In my case after a while during the day I had to takeoff the one on my left foot because it was too hot don’t ask why no idea. I wore them when I was in New York and did a lot of walking I was very happy that I bought them. I would highly recommend them and there’s no question I would use them again.
customer_reviews.author: mazda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, comfortable warmth
customer_reviews.text: Love these things! My feet are always cold and it makes me miserable. The package said they're best when used with heavy socks but I actually wore two pairs. These keep my feet toasty for hours! I'm going to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Toni D.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for deer hunting. Glad I did not spend money on expensive electric socks. I walked about 2 miles in these opening morning of hunting and they stayed in place and were comfortable. They kept my feet warm without getting hot. I used these in 15-25 degree weather with some basic muck Boots and they kept my feet from getting cold. Will use again next year!
customer_reviews.author: Attica23

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a joke gift cause my boyfriends feet are always so cold. They heat up well, and stay heated. They are a bit on the small side, but they do the job. He wears them to bed, not sure how they would be walking on them, cause they puff up a bit, I would think it would be uncomfortable to walk on. They stay stuck though!!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Clifton

customer_reviews.title: They warmed up and stayed warm, but tended to ...
customer_reviews.text: They warmed up and stayed warm, but tended to move around inside of socks. I wore a base layer sock, then the foot warmer, then another pair of socks. I was camping and needed them to keep feet warm in sleeping bag. Only used them for 2 of 6 nights as I needed my sleep, not wasting it fussing with these. Would not but again. Also, they run small in the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Calfeechick

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product fail which is surprising since these usually work. Barely a degree of warmth which left us cold on a campout.! If you buy these try them before you travel.
customer_reviews.author: Happymum

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a chilly football game. Temperatures were around 39 degrees F, but my feet were toasty warm with these insoles. They fit well in my size 7.5 boots, but may seem a little small for men with larger feet. They were comfortable to walk on, and the adhesive kept them in place. So glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: TaraC

customer_reviews.title: Did the Job Of Keeping My Feet Warm
customer_reviews.text: One of my biggest problems in cold weather photography is getting cold feet. I tried these Hot Hands Foot Warmers inside my boots on my last two trips to Yellowstone and Grand Teton National Parks this winter. They worked for about four hours and kept my feet warm. They do not last as long and the Hot Hands Hand Warmers because they are very thin, about 1/8th of an inch. One morning in Grand Teton we photographed the sunrise at the Snake River Overlook and it was minus 24F and my feet did not get cold. I will in the future take several packs of these foot warmers with me on my winter photography trips.
customer_reviews.author: W. Wight

customer_reviews.title: Works, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a chilled warehouse with temperatures ranging 40F to negative 10F. My feet get cold, this helps, and definitely works, though it doesn’t stay hot as long as it advertises. Also, if you put it on wrong the first time, good luck, the adhesive kind of sucks and won’t stick to anything much after
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small and not very warm
customer_reviews.text: Funny how the packaging picture shows the warmer covering the entire foot. That must be a size 5 foot. I wear a size 10 and the warmer only covered the arch of my foot. These do not get very warm and do not provide much warmth to the feet. Not sure they are worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Bernier

customer_reviews.title: Toasty toes!
customer_reviews.text: Coupled this with the toe warmers. The combination kept our feet very warm in below thirty degrees weather and we were outside for several hours. They were comfortable on your feet. Only issue was the adhesive is so strong it pulled the lining out of the shoe some. They had to be removed carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Hudson

customer_reviews.title: These insole warmers really work!
customer_reviews.text: These insole warmers really work! They run very small but it’s not a problem as they cover enough of the arch and ball of your foot to warm your entire foot. I work outside in the weather and I’ve used them in weather as low as in the 20’s and my feet never got cold.
customer_reviews.author: Miche33

customer_reviews.title: Kept my feet warm
customer_reviews.text: I was out in high winds and freezing temps all night and this product kept my feet warm. I had never used Hot Hands before, but now that I've tried them they are going to be a staple at my house. Since trying the ones for feet, I bought the ones for hands too. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Forest

customer_reviews.title: Hoped they would work
customer_reviews.text: Used these on a extremely cold day working outside for 9+ hours. Shortly after fumbling with trying to slide my foot into my boot with them attached to my socks. I had to remove them because I felt like my feet were being burned. It was an uncomfortable feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Not a replacement for proper foot wear and layering
customer_reviews.text: Long time Hot Hands user here. They're easy to use and can last hours. These definitely warm your feet but if you know you'll be in some bitter temps, do yourself a favor and combine these with quality socks and adequate shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ubuntu

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for dad
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my stepdad each year. He uses them constantly for hunting and other outdoor activities. He will be stuck out in all types of weather, usually very cold, and so he keeps these in his truck at all times just in case. They are a great stocking stuffer for anyone who spends long periods of time outdoors in crappy weather.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Green

customer_reviews.title: worth their weight in gold!
customer_reviews.text: Had a trip to Washington DC where the temps dropped below freezing and wind chill dipped below zero. Thanks to these heated inserts, my feet and toes never got cold no matter how long I stayed outside! Heat lasted hours. Cannot recommend these highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: Mark P

customer_reviews.title: Where have these been all my life???
customer_reviews.text: Why had I not discovered these sooner??? These things are heaven for those of us with eternally cold feet! Stick them to the bottom of my socks (they never move or bunch up) and slide my feet into my fleece slippers for 6-8 hours of comfortable bliss!
customer_reviews.author: Disco Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I have a size 8 shoe & my feet were actually hot in my boots while we were out ice fishing. I came in after about 2 hours & they were secured so well to my socks that I gave my entire socks to someone else to wear so she could have warm feet. They are a little thin but that did not take away from the intense heat. My friends even got creative & wrapped them horizontally around their toes over their socks & that worked well for them too. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bower

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for someone whose feet get painfully cold
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver for someone whose feet get painfully cold in winter. I keep them stashed wherever they might come in handy- in my car, in my house, and even in my purse. They last as expected. Unless it becomes an issue, I don't remove the plastic on the bottom of the insert and stick the warmers inside my shoe. The adhesive is a little too strong for use in my good shoes. I plan to repurchase this product every winter!
customer_reviews.author: tammyfayecooks

customer_reviews.title: THEY DID NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I can't be sure why these didn't work- maybe they were expired, maybe they were damaged, maybe it was a defective batch, who knows. What I do know is that I was in 23 degree weather with numb toes. I will never buy these online again.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Slightly warm not toasty
customer_reviews.text: Rode my Mtn bike in 45F weather with my summer shoes and thin socks as a test. Very thin which is nice didn’t feel bulky on my foot. Adhesive was good enough to keep them in place but just barely. They kept my feet from getting cold but not toasty. Toe warmers get hotter and generate more heat. I wonder if this is because they are slightly thicker. I’ll stick with toe warmers for those cold days.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pascale

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: These are good for being in the cold except the ingredients need to moved around to keep generating warmth. I was standing outside for 4 hours so I was shaking my feet a lot. Still, I’d buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Warner

customer_reviews.title: The one and only to pass the test.
customer_reviews.text: Best foot warmers ever made. I worked in an open 50 story building during 5 degree weather. It was tough rough and insane. But this was the only brand to remotely stand up. I needed help so bad, and these were the ONLY ones to stand up. I will never buy another brand. EVER
customer_reviews.author: I Spy

customer_reviews.title: less than 2  hours
customer_reviews.text: I used all the pairs in the pack on a recent trip. Package states "Up to 9 hours" but I am realistic about hte expectations, the hand warmers always last all day. I got less than 2 hours out of every single pair
customer_reviews.author: A. Franke

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: These foot warmers will help keep your feet warmer. Winter construction activity can be tough and being outdoors all day is even tougher. These inserts gave me some needed warmth and in conjunction with their hand warmers made those cold days a little more bearable. They get 4 stars because of size. Their next innovation should be to accomadate various foot sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert  Scala

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: Tested in a week trip in Alaska. -33 degrees and these magical things kept my feet warm. I'd say at that temperature and with the snow, I was changing them about every 5 hrs. The adhesive is very strong so they don't slide in your shoes and the heat lasts a long time. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea V.

customer_reviews.title: Warm feet in single digits
customer_reviews.text: Husband spent two days standing outside on concrete in single digit temps and gusty conditions. He said, while they didn't feel hot as the hand warmers do, his feet were never cold. Amazing. Ordered again
customer_reviews.author: J-L-V

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: A friend and I used these in the arctic this winter. We both thought they weren't working because we couldn't feel the heat. After taking our boots off and touching the warmer with our hands we realized there was some heat coming from them. Maybe we should have worn them with thinner socks, I don't know. But they certainly did not keep our feet warm
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doh

customer_reviews.title: Toasty warm toes
customer_reviews.text: These are great for winter outdoor warm feet. I snowboarded with them in zero degree weather with good results. The sticky strip keeps them nice and in place. They really do last for up to 9 hours. It is best to wear a thin pair of inner socks, attach the foot warmer to those then slip on a pair of outer socks.
customer_reviews.author: LDH

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for several years. They're thin, so not noticeable in my slip ons. The adhesive is strong and heat lasts more than 8 hours. One word of caution: do not put them in your shoes until you are ready to walk in them. Otherwise, they puff up & you can't wear your shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.. product didn't get warm
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work...at all!! Just the same as the toe warmers from the same company. I work in the freezing cold running a CO2 machine, my toes were numb as a mug..just how they are when not wearing these..
customer_reviews.author: 1derwman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed in these. When placed on the bottom of my foot they don't really warm that much. After reading several review on here, people suggested attaching it to the top of your foot. That works really well and heats up great. Unfortunately, the top of your foot is warm but the bottom of your foot will remain cold. I had high hopes for this product but it just didn't work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Penne M.

customer_reviews.title: Small but put off great heat
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars. Reason is they are very small. But they do work and put off a lot of heat. I just have to use 2 to cover the bottom of my foot. I wear a size 10 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for standing outside
customer_reviews.text: I work outside with athletics teams and it can get cold watching peewee football at the end of the season. These keep my feet nice and toasty warm, even in sneakers, for the length of the game and more. I definitely recommend (and would love a full body suit this warm)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a day of skiing
customer_reviews.text: My feet and hands always get cold skiing. I insert these into my boots the morning and never look back. I remove my boot padding and take off the inserts. Sometimes the inserts are a little stuck to the padding but they always come off with and have never torn the boot padding in the past two seasons. These are a mainstay for all freezing and below days.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly bliss
customer_reviews.text: Oh, these inserts are a blessing! Id love them.. I have hashimoto thyroiditis and my feet are always cold and painful. These warmers keep my feet very warm and with much less pain. If I could give 10 stars, I would..
customer_reviews.author: Evelina F.

customer_reviews.title: so so effective
customer_reviews.text: wore them at an NFL game Dec 21, 2019, 30 degree temp, tacked to bottom of socks as directed. feet still got cold, especially toes. they did not heat up nearly as well as the hand warmers
customer_reviews.author: Bill in VA

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps feet nice and warm. This is the second pack I’ve gotten my husband. He wears them in his boots when outside working or riding his motorcycle. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: They Work
customer_reviews.text: They definitely warm you up. Or what ever body part you put them on. I used them to warm my moms legs and feet bc of bad circulation. It made her feel better
customer_reviews.author: Mammadiva

customer_reviews.title: Great idea; below average performance
customer_reviews.text: The HotHands insole foot warmers are easy to use; however, are much too small for most adult feet and do not warm as well as other HotHands products.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Keeping Tootsie's warm
customer_reviews.text: Out in 22 degree weather with my Debra Weitzner socks keep my feet toasty warm. Be sure to put it on your socks as close to the toes as possible for best results.
customer_reviews.author: David B Rich

customer_reviews.title: Warm Warm Warm
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for camping or outside activities in cold weather. They keep my hands, body and toes warm for a few hours. I would say you have at least a good 2.5 to 4 hours of warmth wtb these. I'm going on my third Science Camp trip with my youngest daughter and these were at the top of our packing list. The price is reasonable for the product. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Hot Hands brand works well.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. We let them warm up (air activation) before we use them in our shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It keeps feet warm
customer_reviews.text: This product work to keep feet warm for about 4 to 5 hours. It does keep feet warm enough for a tree stand morning or afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W.

customer_reviews.title: Foot Warmers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my feet are always cold even with warm socks on they would be like ice cubes. So when I went on vacation last month I took them with me and used it and they worked great and last as long as it states on the package. I am really happy that now my feet are toasty warm when I am in the car for a long car ride.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M Kowal

customer_reviews.title: Great multipurpose foot warmer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep feet warm in way below zero weather. Also used it to keep water bottle from freezing and photo battery warm in backpack when outside all day in cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great price! We use them for skiing and they help so much. They charge significantly more at the ski resorts of course
customer_reviews.author: Trw3

customer_reviews.title: Good for about Four Hours
customer_reviews.text: They are good to -25 F for about 3 to 4 hours. Had some cold days this last week. Feet toasty warm. The package says up to 90 hours. No way. Four hours tops in current cold weather. Best combined with toe warmers to cover the full length of an adult male foot; the foot warmers alone are kinda small, about size 7 or 8. Knocked off one star because the 90 hours shtick on the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: TGV

customer_reviews.title: Didn't keep my feet as warm as I'd hoped they would.
customer_reviews.text: I used these for about 3 hours inside winter boots in subzero Midwestern winter weather & they didn't keep my feet as warm as I'd hoped they would.
customer_reviews.author: NorthernGirl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They really didn’t do the job I was expecting. I’ve used the toasty toes before so I was expecting much more than that . But I was disappointed. I won’t buy these again, I’ll stick to the toasty toes
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Best solution for my winter !
customer_reviews.text: It the best product I found to my winter. I have really cold foot in the winter, in any condition at any shoe, and by that product, it's not a problem any more. Since I order mean at the end of last winter, it was in my closet for 6 months, and now used it, it awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good. It keeps my feet warm at night when ...
customer_reviews.text: It's good. It keeps my feet warm at night when I'm sleeping or trying to sleep. I only need it occasionally when I have one of my 'spells' of insanely cold feet at night. This helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Grace G.

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! Used them on a ski trip with weather ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Used them on a ski trip with weather in the low 20's. I had a mild case of frostbite as a child, and as a result my toes get very cold and actually turn white due to lack of circulation. These are so much better than simple toe warmers. They fit every easily into my ski boots and kept both feet very warm. They particularly have better coverage through the entire toe area, instead of a little pack that balls up under just one or two toes. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Jim L,

customer_reviews.title: Good but not clear
customer_reviews.text: Really should have shaken these up before putting them in my boots. They stayed cold until I walked out of the stadium to find a taxi a few hours after opening them. After activation in the cab they started working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Fatty

customer_reviews.title: Good for EMT persons
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for the EMT person. It has kept them warm and comfy while helping people. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P B Illingworth

customer_reviews.title: Great for deer hunting
customer_reviews.text: Great for deer hunting. My kids used them when it was 10 degrees out and were able to stay in their deer stands for 4 hours
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Thin warm and comfortable! Working outside for hours was not miserable! I could focus on the game and not my cold feet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would work better than the hand warmers which I generally wear in my boots. Alas, the don't work - it was a waste of money. Back to hand warmers for boots.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy

customer_reviews.title: The Heat Goes On
customer_reviews.text: Best available. No hype about the 9 hour duration. They do have adhesive backing, so don't use them against anything delicate. Insoles deliver effective heat to the entire foot. Avoid the wannabe cheaper competitor, Grabbers and also avoid the smaller version of these, the Hothands Foot Warmer. Get the FULL FOOT coverage you so desperately need and so richly deserve with this phenomenal quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: It should have various shoe sizes. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have used the body warmer, hand warmer, toe warmer. This foot warmer was a great disappointment. I wear a 7 1/2 shoe it was too small and it went in warm but did not stay warm. I won’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: They are very thin and very small.
customer_reviews.text: They didn't seem to produce much heat. They need to be bigger and contain more heat producing contents.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised how small they were. Looked like they were for a small child. So didn't get much heat out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great for super cold days outdoors
customer_reviews.text: We've been having some freezing temperatures and I needed something extra to keep my feet warm during my morning commutes (as well as keep my feet warm and toasty in a cold office). These just did the trick and lasts up to 9 hours. It really helps with reducing my foot cramps!
customer_reviews.author: Minoware

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I can wear my rain boots in the winter and my feet stay comfortable in 25-30 degree f weather!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Needs to last longer than two hours.
customer_reviews.text: Needs to last longer than two hours. After my school crossing they are done before 11 and I need to get back out there for lunch crossing and they are already done
customer_reviews.author: christine valentine

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: this product works pretty well. Wore them on my feet while on a camp trip. 30 degree overnight, feet stayed nice a warm.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love these. My neighbor tslked FOREVER after the snowstorm and I had only planned a quick trip out to clear my car and got stuck talking.. one pair of socks and sneakers I was frozen...had these in trunk for emergencies. Grabbed a pair and it said warm up in 30 mins, was 5 and got the feeling starting back !
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: They absolutely work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who has a problem with cold feet she loves them they work very well
customer_reviews.author: Renee Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: Really warm!
customer_reviews.text: Got for a professional football game in Cleveland and kept our feet warm/hot for a couple of hours. Would definitely purchase again and do recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer June

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect for me! I work outside in the early mornings and these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Toasty and Warm
customer_reviews.text: These insoles are nice to wear to take the chill off. Would be nice if the warmth covered more of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hunting
customer_reviews.text: These keep my kids feet warm while hunting. We're out for hours and before finding these, they would be complaining of cold feet. Well, no more. These are life savers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my emergency go bag. No matter what I can at least be warm.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my emergency go bag. In an emergency I don’t want to add being cold and in a bad situation. I ordered both the foot warmers & the hand warmers. At least I will be warm.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Not effective.
customer_reviews.text: These made no perceivable difference - not sense of heat at all when used.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend wears these every time he hunts and to work ...
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend wears these every time he hunts and to work most days in the winter. At first it's weird having something stuck to your foot but you get over it when you realize how warm your feet are
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T

product_meta.title: HotHands Insole Foot Warmers With Adhesive Value Pack (5-Pairs)
product_meta.description:
Bring the Heat!

HotHands Insole Warmers are single use air-activated heat packs that provide everyday warmth and are ideal for keeping your feet warm when the temperature gets cold. These warmers provide safe, natural heat, so you can enjoy the great outdoors during those harsh winter months. The insole warmers are ultra-thin, have a rounded toe and are designed for optimal comfort in boots & shoes. 

Specs & Details:
• Quantity: 10 Individual Insole Warmers (5 pairs). 
• Duration OF Heat: Up to 9 hours of heat. 
• Activation Time: 15-30 minutes. 
• Average Temperature: 99 degrees Fahrenheit (37 degrees Celsius). 
• Max Temperature: 109 degrees Fahrenheit (43 degrees Celsius). 
• Ingredients: Iron Powder, Water, Salt, Activated Charcoal, and Wood Fiber. 
• Country of Origin: Made in the USA using domestic and imported materials. 
• Storage: Keep in a cool place out of direct sunlight. 

Trusted -HotHands, the leader in air-activated warmers, has been warming hands, feet, and bodies for over 20 years. It’s a brand trusted all over the world by professional athletes, outdoor sporting enthusiasts, spectators, skiers, outdoor worker and by anyone wanting safe, convenient, concentrated warmth in cold weather conditions. 

Directions -Do not open the outer package until ready to use. Remove warmer from the outer package: shake to activate. Do not open, puncture, or tear warmer. Warmer heats up in 15-30 minutes. If heat decreases, expose warmer to air and shake. After use, dispose with regular garbage. Ingredients will not harm the environment.

Buy with Confidence -To ensure you receive genuine HotHands products when shopping online, please only purchase from authorized distributors or retailers or an Amazon listing that clearly states the product is sold and shipped directly by Amazon. com. Unauthorized sellers, such as private sellers (not commercial sellers) may offer outdated products or imitations not meeting HotHands quality standards. We want our customers to purchase our products with the confidence that they are getting genuine, quality HotHands products.
feature_bullets: SAFE, NATURAL LONG-LASTING HEAT - Odorless, Disposable, Single-Use Item, Do Not Apply Directly to The Skin. TSA Approved. Made in the USA using domestic and imported materials.

TO ACTIVATE - Remove warmer from outer package, shake to activate. Warmer heats up in 15-30 minutes. If heat decreases, expose warmer to air and shake. After use, dispose with regular garbage. Ingredients will not harm the environment.

MULTIPURPOSE WARMERS - Single use air-activated heat packs that provide everyday warmth and are ideal for keeping your body warm when the temperature gets cold. They’re available in several styles designed for your hands, feet, and body.

QUAILTY - To ensure you receive genuine HotHands products when shopping online, please only purchase from authorized distributors or retailers or an Amazon listing that clearly states the product is sold and shipped directly by Amazon. com.
WHEN TO USE: Tailgating at Events, Outdoor Sporting Events, Hunting & Fishing, Camping & Hiking, Working in The Yard, Jogging or Taking Your Pet for A Walk. Convenient, Compact, Portable.
Each pair provides up to 9 hours of heat with adhesive on one side so it stays where you stick it

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
